description: Learn how to build Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that enable AI to interact with external tools. This project guides you through creating your first MCP server, configuring MCPs in Claude Desktop, automating browsers with Playwright and building AI-agentic web browsing. By the end, you'll be able to extend AI capabilities to perform complex tasks like browser automation, web research, and specialized API interactions.
title: Build your first MCP (Junie)
short_description: Learn how to build MCP and why it matters for AI-powered automation
